description: Saxon-HE (home edition) is an open source product available under the Mozilla Public License version 2.0. It provides implementations of XSLT (3.0), XQuery (3.1), and XPath (2.0 and 3.1) at the basic level of conformance defined by W3C.
displayName: Saxon Home Edition XSLT and Xquery Processor
summary: Saxon Home Edition XSLT and Xquery Processor
author: alegrowin
